title: Dr. Mike
body: Do you like to indulge in the sweetness of candy after a hard week of coding?

title: Jenna
body: When the client is off, we are off. Therefore you get an extra vacation week to use during Easter and Christmas.

title: Jonas
body: Some times HK (hyttekontor) is more tempting then busy city streets.

title: Inga
body: Everybody has to keep learning, so you have our full support to go to any conference you want.

title: Andy
body: Ok, he might not be personal. But our house chef will make you lunch every day of the week.
